metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The friendly name for the workspace that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The friendly name for the connected cluster.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The Azure region with which the workbook will be associated

content.json:
# PURE Storage Dashboard
---

Get more value from your data with an easy-to-deploy, high-performance data experience, delivering real-time analytics on an all-flash distributed platform. Pure Storage helps you embrace the future of cloud and data flexibility with a true, as-a-service model that's simple to manage and always evergreen.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "purefa"
| distinct _ResourceId

links.linkLabel: Pure Storage FlashArray Storage Usage Overview

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_info"
| parse-where kind = regex Tags with "array_name\":\"" array_name "\"," *
| extend a=split(array_name,'"')
| project array_name=a[0]
| summarize by tostring(array_name)
content.title: Array Name

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize capacityBytes=avgif(Val, Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes")
content.title: Total Capacity

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize usedBytes=avgif(Val, Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"), capacityBytes=avgif(Val, Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes")
| extend FreeSpace=capacityBytes-usedBytes
content.title: Free Space

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize usedBytes=avgif(Val, Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"), capacityBytes=avgif(Val, Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes")
| extend FreeSpace80=(capacityBytes*(0.8))-usedBytes
content.title: Free Space with 80% capacity
Free Usable

content.query:
let usedBytes = 
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| summarize usedBytes=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m);
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes"
| summarize capacityBytes=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| join (usedBytes) on TimeGenerated
| extend Free_Space = capacityBytes-toint(toscalar(usedBytes))
content.title: Free Space

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| summarize UsedBytes=avg(Val)
content.title: Capacity Usage on Arrays

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_provisioned_bytes"
| summarize UsedBytes=avg(Val)
content.title: Provisioned bytes on Arrays

content.query:
let provisionedBytes=InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_provisioned_bytes"
| summarize provisionedBytes=sum(Val);
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes"
| summarize CapacityBytes=sum(Val)
| extend OverProvisionedBytes=toscalar(provisionedBytes)/CapacityBytes
content.title: Over Provisioned bytes on Arrays

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_datareduction_ratio"
| summarize datareductionratio=avg(Val)
content.title: Datareduction Ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_iops"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| summarize avg(Val) by dimension
content.title: Average IOPS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_latency_usec"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| summarize avg=avg(Val)/1000 by dimension
| where avg > 0
| order by avg desc
| limit 3
content.title: Average IO Latency

content.query:
let usedBytes = 
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| summarize usedBytes=avg(Val) by Computer;
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes"
| summarize capacityBytes=avg(Val) by Computer
| join (usedBytes) on Computer
| extend Free_space = capacityBytes-usedBytes
| extend Capacity_Usage = usedBytes/capacityBytes*100
| extend Allocation=round(Capacity_Usage,3)
| join kind = inner( InsightsMetrics
    | where Computer in ({Computer})
    | where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
    | make-series Usage_Trend = avg(Val) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from  {Timeframe:start} to {Timeframe:end} step 1h by Computer
    | project-away TimeGenerated
    ) on Computer
content.title: Capacity Usage Table

content.query:
let total_iops = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| summarize total_iops=sum(Val)
;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize iops=sum(Val) by dimension
| extend total_iops=toscalar(total_iops)
| extend iops_ratio = (iops/total_iops)*100
content.title: IOPS Ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val
| summarize usedBytes=avg(Val), ActualusedBytes=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Computer
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), usedBytes=make_list(usedBytes) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(usedBytes)
| mv-expand Timestamp, usedBytes, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedusedBytes=series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_baseline
| project-rename Anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_flag
| extend Gap = todecimal(usedBytes)-todecimal(ExpectedusedBytes)
| where Gap != 0
| extend Trend=iff(Gap>0, "Up", "Down")
| extend ActualVsExpectedAsPercent = round(todecimal(usedBytes)*100/todecimal(ExpectedusedBytes), 2)
| sort by todatetime(Timestamp) asc
| extend Avg_usedBytes = round(todecimal(usedBytes) / 1000000000,3), Expected_Avg_usedBytes = round(todecimal(ExpectedusedBytes) / 1000000000,3)
| extend Alert = case(ActualVsExpectedAsPercent>120, "Alert",ActualVsExpectedAsPercent<60, "Alert", "OK")
| project Computer, Timestamp=format_datetime(todatetime(Timestamp), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Trend, Avg_usedBytes, Expected_Avg_usedBytes, ActualVsExpectedAsPercent, Alert, Anomalies
content.title: Daily usedBytes Trend analysis

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| summarize usedBytes=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), usedBytes=make_list(usedBytes) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(usedBytes, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand Timestamp, usedBytes, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedusedBytes=series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_baseline
| project-rename anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_usedBytes_ad_flag
| project Timestamp, toint(usedBytes), toint(ExpectedusedBytes), toint(anomalies)
| where anomalies >= 0
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies)
content.title: usedBytes Anomaly Detection

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Val
| summarize iops=avg(Val), Actualiops=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Computer
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), iops=make_list(iops) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(iops)
| mv-expand Timestamp, iops, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_score
| project-rename Expectediops=series_decompose_anomalies_iops_baseline
| project-rename Anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_flag
| extend Gap = todecimal(iops)-todecimal(Expectediops)
| where Gap != 0
| extend Trend=iff(Gap>0, "Up", "Down")
| extend ActualVsExpectedAsPercent = round(todecimal(iops)*100/todecimal(Expectediops), 2)
| sort by todatetime(Timestamp) asc
//| extend Avg_iops = round(todecimal(iops) / 1000000000,3), Expected_Avg_iops = round(todecimal(Expectediops) / 1000000000,3)
| extend Avg_iops = round(todecimal(iops),3), Expected_Avg_iops = round(todecimal(Expectediops),3)
| extend Alert = case(ActualVsExpectedAsPercent ==0, "-",
                      ActualVsExpectedAsPercent>120, "Alert",
                      ActualVsExpectedAsPercent<60, "Alert", 
                      "OK")
| project Computer, Timestamp=format_datetime(todatetime(Timestamp), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Trend, Avg_iops, Expected_Avg_iops, ActualVsExpectedAsPercent, Alert, Anomalies
content.title: Daily IOPS Trend analysis

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| summarize iops=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), iops=make_list(iops) by Computer
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(iops, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand Timestamp, iops, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_iops_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_score
| project-rename Expectediops=series_decompose_anomalies_iops_baseline
| project-rename anomalies=series_decompose_anomalies_iops_ad_flag
| project Timestamp, toint(iops), toint(Expectediops), toint(anomalies)
| render anomalychart with(anomalycolumns=anomalies)
content.title: IOPS Anomaly Detection

content.query:
let VSB = 
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_bytes"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize VSB=avg(Val) by volume;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_size_bytes"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize VSSB=avg(Val) by volume
| join (VSB) on volume
| extend Volume_Capacity_Usage =(VSB/VSSB)*100
| order by Volume_Capacity_Usage desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 volume space usage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_datareduction_ratio"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize DRR=sum(Val) by volume
content.title: Datareduction Ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_bytes"
| parse-where kind = regex Tags with "dimension\":\"" dimension "\"," *
| extend dimension=tostring(split(dimension,'"')[0])
| summarize avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Average Capacity Usage Distribution

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_size_bytes"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend instance=tostring(json.instance)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| summarize VSB=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), volume
//| order by VSB desc
content.title: Volume SizeUsage over Time

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_bytes"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend instance=tostring(json.instance)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| summarize VSB=avg(Val) by bin (TimeGenerated,30m), volume
//| order by VSB desc
content.title: Volume Space Usage over Time

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_datareduction_ratio"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend instance=tostring(json.instance)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| summarize VSB=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), volume
//| order by VSB desc
content.title: Volume DatareductionRatio over Time

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_throughput_bytes"
| parse-where kind = regex Tags with "dimension\":\"" dimension "\"," *
| extend dimension=tostring(split(dimension,'"')[0])
| summarize sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Volume Throughput

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_latency_usec"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize latency=sum(Val)/1000 by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Volume Latency

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize iops=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Volume IOPS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_throughput_bytes"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), volume
content.title: Top talker volumes by throughput

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_latency_usec"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize avg(Val) /1000 by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), volume

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), volume
content.title: Top talker volumes by IOPS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "purefa_info"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend array_name=tostring(json.array_name)
| summarize by tostring(array_name)
content.title: Array Name

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "purefa_info"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend version=tostring(json.version)
| summarize by tostring(version)
content.title: Firmware Version

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "purefa_hardware_temperature_celsius"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| extend controller=iff(string_size(controller)>=1,strcat("Controller ",controller), "")
| where string_size(controller)>=1
| summarize temp=avg(Val)
content.title: Hardware Temp in C

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "purefa_hardware_power_volts"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize volt=avg(Val)
content.title: Power Voltage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize capacityBytes=avgif(Val, Name has "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes")
content.title: Total Capacity

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize usedBytes=avgif(Val, Name has "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"), capacityBytes=avgif(Val, Name has "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes")
| extend FreeSpace=capacityBytes-usedBytes
content.title: Free Space

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"
| summarize capacity=sumif(Val, Name has "purefa_array_space_capacity_bytes"), used=sumif(Val, Name has "purefa_array_space_used_bytes")
| extend capacity_usage = (used/capacity)*100
content.title: Capacity Usage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name has "purefa_array_space_used_bytes"
| summarize UsedBytes=avg(Val)
content.title: Usage on Arrays

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name has "purefa_array_space_datareduction_ratio"
| summarize datareduction_ratio=avg(Val)
content.title: Datareduction ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "pure"
| summarize by Name
| extend Category=case( Name contains "hardware", "Hardware", 
                        Name contains "Volume", "Volume", 
                        Name contains "performance", "Performance",
                        Name contains "space", "Space",
                        "Others")
| project Category, Name
content.title: Metrics collected from Pure Storage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| where component == "BAY"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val)
content.title: Disk BAYS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| where component == "NVB"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val)
content.title: NVRAM

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| where component == "PWR"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val)
content.title: Power Supply

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_chassis_health"
| summarize CH=avg(Val)
content.title: Chassis Health

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_controller_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| summarize c1=avg(Val) by controller
| extend status=iff(toint(c1) == 1, "OK", "FAIL"), controller=strcat("Controller ",controller)
content.title: Controller Health

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_temperature_celsius"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| summarize c1=avg(Val) by controller
| extend controller=iff(string_size(controller)>=1,strcat("Controller ",controller), "")
| where string_size(controller)>=1
content.title: Controller Temperature

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "ETH"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by controller
| extend controller=iff(string_size(controller)>=1,strcat("Controller ",controller), "")
| where string_size(controller)>=1
| extend Disk=iff(Disk == 0, "OK", "ERROR")
content.title: Ethernet Ports

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "FAN"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by controller
| extend controller=iff(string_size(controller)>=1,strcat("Controller ",controller), "")
| where string_size(controller)>=1
| extend Disk=iff(Disk == 0, "OK", "ERROR")
content.title: Fans

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "TMP"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by controller
| extend controller=iff(string_size(controller)>=1,strcat("Controller ",controller), "")
| where string_size(controller)>=1
| extend Disk=iff(toint(Disk) == 0, "OK", "CRITICAL")
content.title: Temperature sensors

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| where component == "BAY"
| summarize Disk=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where Disk != 1
content.title: Failed SSD's

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| where component == "NVB"
| summarize Disk=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where Disk != 1

content.query:
InsightsMetrics

| summarize Disk=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where Disk != 1

content.query:
InsightsMetrics

| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "ETH"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), controller
| where Disk != 0

content.query:
InsightsMetrics

| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "FAN"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), controller
| where Disk != 0
content.title: Failed fans

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "FC"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), controller
| where Disk != 0
content.title: Failed fiber channel ports

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend component=tostring(json.component)
| extend controller=tostring(json.controller)
| where component == "TMP"
| summarize Disk=count(Val)-sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), controller
| where Disk != 0
content.title: Failed temperature sensors

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "alerts"
| parse-where kind = regex Tags with "severity\":\""severity"\"}"
| summarize count() by severity
content.title: Alert classification

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_latency_usec"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| where dimension == "mirrored_write"
| summarize SB=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Mirrored Write

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_alerts_total"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend instance=tostring(json.instance)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend severity=tostring(json.severity)
| summarize SB=count(severity) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), severity
content.title: System Events

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_info"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend array_name=tostring(json.array_name)
| summarize by tostring(array_name)
content.title: Array Name

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_info"
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend version=tostring(json.version)
| summarize by tostring(version)

content.query:
let component = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_component_health"
| summarize comp=count(Val)-sum(Val);
let chassis = InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_chassis_health"
| summarize chassis=count(Val)-sum(Val);
InsightsMetrics
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "purefa_hardware_controller_health"
| summarize controller=count(Val)-sum(Val)
| extend overall=controller + toscalar(chassis)+toscalar(component)
content.title: Hardware Health

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_iops"
| summarize avg_iops=avg(Val)
content.title: Average IOPS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_latency_usec"
| summarize avg_io_latency=avg(Val)
content.title: Average IO Latency

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_array_performance_latency_usec"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| where dimension == "mirrored_write"
| summarize avg_io_latency=avg(Val)
content.title: Average Mirror Latency

content.query:
let total_iops = InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| summarize total_iops=sum(Val)
;
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_performance_iops"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize iops=sum(Val) by dimension
| extend total_iops=toscalar(total_iops)
| extend iops_ratio = (iops/total_iops)*100
content.title: IOPS Ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_datareduction_ratio"
| extend json=parse_json(todynamic(Tags))
| extend dimension=tostring(json.dimension)
| extend volume=tostring(json.volume)
| summarize DRR=sum(Val) by volume
content.title: Datareduction Ratio

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "purefa_volume_space_bytes"
| parse-where kind = regex Tags with "dimension\":\"" dimension "\"," *
| extend dimension=tostring(split(dimension,'"')[0])
| summarize avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), dimension
content.title: Capacity Usage Distribution

| summarize dcount(Name) by Computer

| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName

content.json: ## 💡 _Click on a Pod to see more details about the Container's listed, logs, events and more information._

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerName
| extend PodName = Name
| project-away Name
| project-reorder Computer, PodName, Namespace, ContainerName
content.title: List Node, Pod, Containers

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}", "-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(startDateTime)
| where Namespace in('default', 'kube-system', 'nc-system') // and ControllerKind == 'ReplicaSet' // the system namespace filter goes here
| distinct
    ClusterName,
    Computer,
    PodUid,
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    ContainerStatus,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| summarize
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *),
    TotalPODCount = count(),
    podCount = sumif(1, PodStatus == 'Running' or PodStatus != 'Running'),
    containerNotrunning = sumif(1, ContainerStatus != 'running')
    by
    ClusterName,
    TimeGenerated,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| project
    ClusterName,
    ServiceName,
    podCount,
    containerNotrunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent = (containerNotrunning * 100 / podCount),
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Environment = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[3]),
    Location = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[4]),
    ContainerStatus,
    ControllerKind,
    Name,
    Computer
//Uncomment the below line to set for automated alert
| where PodStatus == "Running" //and containerNotrunningPercent > _minalertThreshold and containerNotrunningPercent < _maxalertThreshold
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), c_entry=count() by PodLabel, ServiceName, ClusterName, ControllerKind, Name, Computer
//Below lines are to parse the labels to identify the impacted service/component name
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'k8s-app', @'k8sapp', PodLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/component', @'appkubernetesiocomponent', parseLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/instance', @'appkubernetesioinstance', parseLabel)
| extend tags = todynamic(parseLabel)
| extend tag01 = todynamic(tags[0].app)
| extend tag02 = todynamic(tags[0].k8sapp)
| extend tag03 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesiocomponent)
| extend tag04 = todynamic(tags[0].aadpodidbinding)
| extend tag05 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesioinstance)
| extend tag06 = todynamic(tags[0].component)
| extend ContainerRunning = 100 - containerNotrunningPercent
| project ClusterName, TimeGenerated, ControllerKind, Name, Computer,
    ServiceName = strcat(ServiceName, tag01, tag02, tag03, tag04, tag05, tag06),
    ContainerUnavailable = strcat("Unavailable Percentage: ", containerNotrunningPercent),
    ContainerRunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent,
    PodStatus = PodStatus, 
    ContainerStatus = ContainerStatus
content.title: Pod/Container Availability

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of PodUid by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of PodCreationTimeStamp by max(1), top-nested of PodRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of PodStartTime by max(1), top-nested of PodStatus by max(1), top-nested of PodIp by max(1), top-nested of ServiceName by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Pod details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of ContainerID by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of ContainerLastStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerName by max(1), top-nested of ContainerRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStartTime by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatusReason by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Container details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join KubeEvents on Computer, Name, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Name, Reason, Message, KubeEventType, SourceComponent
| extend PodName = Name
content.title: KubeEvents for the Pods

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join ContainerLog on Computer, ContainerID, _ResourceId
| project-away TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated1, ContainerID, TimeOfCommand, Image, LogEntry, LogEntrySource
| project-rename TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated1
content.title: Container Log
